author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3441 (partial): Determine and implement a proper procedure for resetting a prepared statement for reuse in a statement pool.
Extracted an internal method setTransactionIsolationX from setTransactionIsolation, basically to avoid checking for closed connection multiple times.
Also cleaned up JavaDoc and some formatting issues.

author: crossley
msg: Move the listing of accompanying licenses from the projectInfo plugin to the top-level LICENSE.txt file.
They somehow got mixed up at r524007.

author: markh
msg: Refactored ClassLoaderHelper into MavenRuntimeVisitorUtils in preparation of apply visitors to objects other than class loaders

author: ptahchiev
msg: changed the assembly goal that was bound in the parent pom.xml, and caused the fork of the build process.
